name: Riders of Asgard
description: Riders of Asgard is a fun and challenging Viking BMX game. Unlock new maps and items to upgrade your Bike and Rider, and access previously unreachable places. Riders of Asgard features a full single player campaign as well as local multiplayer to take on your friends!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible graphics card DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 8 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space
